tool_description: Monitors storage space utilization for backup destinations, tracks available capacity, and predicts when storage limits will be reached based on growth trends.

storage_path.description: Path to backup storage location to monitor

warning_threshold_percent.description: Storage utilization percentage to trigger warnings

critical_threshold_percent.description: Storage utilization percentage to trigger critical alerts

trend_analysis_days.description: Number of days of historical data to analyze for trends

include_projections.description: Whether to calculate future capacity projections

error_messages: Storage path not found: The specified storage_path does not exist or is inaccessible.
Invalid threshold values: warning_threshold_percent must be less than critical_threshold_percent.
Threshold out of range: Threshold percentages must be between 0 and 100.
Invalid trend period: trend_analysis_days must be a positive integer between 1 and 365.
Insufficient permissions: Unable to read storage information from the specified path.
usage: Provide storage_path to monitor. Adjust threshold percentages and trend_analysis_days as needed. Enable include_projections for capacity planning insights.

used_space_gb.description: Currently used storage space in gigabytes

projected_full_date.description: Estimated date when storage will be full based on trends

daily_growth_rate_gb.description: Average daily storage growth rate in gigabytes
